New Records: Adolis García set a record with 15 RBIs in an ALCS series
Key Match Events: Adolis García hit a grand slam in the ninth inning of Game 6
Adolis García nearly hit three home runs in Game 7
Adolis García's performance in the final four games of the ALCS was historic
Post-Match Reflections: Texas Rangers players and manager praised Adolis García's performance
Adolis García's resilience and clutch moments were highlighted by teammates and the manager
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adolis García's journey to stardom and his impact on the Texas Rangers
The Texas Rangers reached the World Series for the first time since 2011
